But it was Gabrielle Giffords ' husband's reaction to this milestone that made Kirsten Gillibrand realize this was the very first time Gabrielle Giffords had opened her eyes since being shot. It was dramatic. We didn't understand the importance of that. We didn't know that she had not opened her eyes. But when we watched Mark we knew.
